text: Stupid as a man, say the women: cowardly as a woman, say the men. Stupidity in a woman is unwomanly.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: It is unbecoming for young men to utter maxims.
author: Aristotle

text: Here in America we are descended in blood and in spirit from revolutionists and rebels - men and women who dare to dissent from accepted doctrine. As their heirs, may we never confuse honest dissent with disloyal subversion.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

text: How could man rejoice in victory and delight in the slaughter of men?
author: Lao Tzu

text: Not necessity, not desire - no, the love of power is the demon of men. Let them have everything - health, food, a place to live, entertainment - they are and remain unhappy and low-spirited: for the demon waits and waits and will be satisfied.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche
